com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence
Interface TypeAdapter<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
RestfulJsonTypeAdapter, RestfulPairsTypeAdapter, RestfulXmlTypeAdapter, SqliteTypeAdapter
public interface TypeAdapter<T>

Facilitates the mapping of datastore values to Java data types.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0 03/17/12
Author:
Tyler Treat

Method Summary
 void mapToObject(ResultSet result, int index, java.lang.reflect.Field field, java.lang.Object model)
          Maps a datastore value to a domain model's Field.
 

Method Detail

mapToObject

void mapToObject(ResultSet result,
                 int index,
                 java.lang.reflect.Field field,
                 java.lang.Object model)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
Maps a datastore value to a domain model's Field.

Parameters:
result - the ResultSet where the column is being mapped from
index - the index of the column holding the data to be mapped
field - the Field being mapped to
model - the model which the Field is populating
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the mapped value is not compatible with the declaring class
java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if the Field is not accessible
